page.title: 08INDUSTRIES IN MARSWORTH
page.content: {FARMING} (Mixed arable mostly cereals, pig breeding.)Ornamental paving slab manufacture.Car repair/sales.{SHOPS (One general stores with a sub_post office and one Canal leisure boat supplies and souvenirs.Butchers shop at Pitstone with a milk round and take a way Chinese food service.Generalshop on the edge of Pitstone. {OTHER}Egg Packing at Gubblecote. Horse stud farm and a Riding school Builders suppliers use abandoned air field buildings. Gravel and sand suppliers as off shoot of garage. SEVERAL{FARMERS WIVES}sell produce "at the gate" including eggs, Frozen ducks,chickens,pet rabbits, goats and goats milk products. {Pitstone Farm}opens its extensive collection of old farm implements to the public on 3 Sundays each year. Breeding and selling of fresh Trout. {ARTISTS}crafts men sell their work.
